title: Surface Magazine
content:
Looking to identify the extra light sans face used on the cover of the current Surface magazine.   
   
 ![Surface Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526222043im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48495.jpg)
author: Grant Hutchinson

comments.content:
Custom, eh? Thanks, anywho.   
   
Any background information on the designer? Was it an in-house job? Still curious...

Looks like a hairline version of Hubert Jocham's Teleneue.   
 [http://www.hubertjocham.de/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526222043/http:/www.hubertjocham.de/)   
   
You've got to dig through the  aweful nagivation to get to it.

Yeah, the letterforms are close, but there are still a few inconsistencies - like the upstroke terminal of the uppercase G. Of course, the site hasn't been updated in a couple of years, so there may be some example of his custom work missing from the pile. I'll keep plugging away...

When all else fails, try calling 'em:   
   
West Coast Office   
1663 Mission Street, Suite #700   
San Francisco, CA 94103   
tel 415-575-3100 fax 415-575-3105
